name: Domingo Gregory
title: Really well built. Excellent finishing.
review: As a watch enthusiast who is generally all about the well-known brands, I ordered this watch because it is a homage to the Rolex Datejust with fluted bezel.

name: Cameron Foster
title: Great value for the bucks
review: The watch carries a lot of value for the cost you pay. You get sapphire crystal / automatic movement (Miyota - very durable) / nice finish on the case & bracelet.

name: Curtis Cain
title: Received compliments on this!
review: I've had this watch for about two years now and am impressed with its build quality. It still looks new and I've even had people compliment me on my nice watch.

name: Woodrow Rivera
title: Surprised about the good quality
review: This is my first Burei watch and I'm really surprised about the nice quality. Heavy, but not too heavy, the Japanese Miyota is running smoothly.

name: Joshua Newman
title: Awesome Watch
review: I bought this watch as a gift for a friend but when it arrived it looked so good I kept it and save my friend a different one.

name: Wayne Malone
title: Well built, I highly recommended!!
review: I have every model of Rolex besides several other high end Swiss and German brands including a few Grand Seiko.
